name: MoonOrSun
description:
This is my first ever Unity Game for the Kindred Community Game jam#7. I thought this would be a great opportunity to learn a bit of GameDev. I enjoyed the time even when i realised i could not add all features i wanted in the given Time!

(There is a visual error in the HTML5 Version at the bottom of the Death Screen which i couldnt fix for the Web Version So download the .zip file for better expierience :))

Special thanks to my friend Sebastian who helped me with some bug fixing and problem solving

Controls:

WASD to move

Space to Jump
